metadata.name: Generate Post From Plan
metadata.shortDescription: Generate engaging blog posts from presentation content or technical documentation with choice of brochure or conversational styles
metadata.description: Transform presentation plans, technical documentation, or project information into professional blog posts tailored for development teams and IT professionals. Offers two distinct writing styles - brochure (structured, feature-focused) and conversational (narrative, story-driven) - with consistent professional quality standards.
objectives: Convert technical presentations into accessible blog content
Generate both structured and narrative style blog posts from single source
Maintain professional quality standards for IT audience
Ensure optimal reading length and engagement
metadata.author: OLAF Framework Migration

prompts.description: Main prompt for generating blog posts from presentation plans or technical documentation
